bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign of an emaciated body and a distressed facial complexion. Wai tai mi yao 外台秘要 6: 素有 冷病，年衰力弱，膚肉瘦悴，此則積冷在胃 , “If someone has a cold disease for his entire life, if over the years he becomes weaker and weaker, if skin and flesh are emaciated and distressed , then this is a case of cold accumulating in the stomach”.

② Pathological Condition of diseases whose main sign is emaciation and distress. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry ren ru 人乳：治瘦悴，悅皮膚，潤毛髮 , “It cures emaciation and distress . It returns luster to the skin, and makes the hair shine glossy again”.
